personalInformation.summary: Punctual, customer-focused professional focused on exceeding expectations and building customer loyalty. Flexible schedule and strong communicator who consistently meets and exceeds customer service goals. Reliable team player with an enthusiastic, outgoing attitude.
personalInformation.title: SALES ASSOCIATE
